lead_paragraph: The creators of four new books have taken on a difficult task with courage and compassion in stories of children forced to leave home.
snippet: The creators of four new books have taken on a difficult task with courage and compassion in stories of children forced to leave home....

headline.main: How Do You Explain the Refugee Crisis to Children? New Picture Books Can Help
headline.print_headline: How Do You Explain the Refugee Crisis to Children? New Picture Books Can Help
